section.title: sales history summarized reporting Summarized Sales History

listitem.para: Be sure to enable all the column headers you want to see in order to take full advantage of the data available on this screen.
Isolate the sales information you're looking for by combining the grouping options with the custom search filter options.
Search for orders using the customer's P/O number.
Prices are normalized to the Base currency using the Currency exchange rate effective on the invoice Date.
Don't forget to save your custom search filters so you and others in your organization can use them for future searches.

note.para: The Summarized Sales History screen includes miscellaneous items by default. When comparing results from this report to other sales history reports, be sure to include the misc. items parameter when running those other reports.

section.para: The following options on this screen are a supplement to the choices available under the search filter:

listitem.para: Specify how you want the information grouped: by customer, sales rep., customer type, shipping zone, item, or site.
Specify the currency you want to see the results in: base currency or the local Currency from the original sales order.
